faq.question1: How do I create an account?
faq.answer1: You can create an account by clicking on "Register" in the main menu. Then fill out the form with your personal information.
faq.question2: How do I create a wishlist?
faq.answer2: Once logged in, go to the "My Gifts" section, then click on the "My wishlist" tab and on the "Add a gift idea" button.
faq.question3: How do I share my wishlist?
faq.answer3: All the gifts of your wishlist are shared with all the members of your groups.
faq.answer4: Yes, all basic features of Gifters are free. We also offer premium features for the most demanding users.

features.title: Features Q&A
features.question1: How do I create a group?
features.answer1: To create a group, log into your account, go to the "My Groups" section and click on "Create a Group". Give your group a name, add a description and invite your friends or family.
features.question2: How do I add members to my group?
features.answer2: In the group details page, click on "Invite Members". You can invite people by email or by generating an invitation link that you can share.
features.question3: How do I organize a gift exchange?
features.answer3: In your group, go to the "Events" section and click on "Organize a Gift Exchange". Select the participants, set the rules (budget, exclusions) and start the draw. Each participant will receive a notification telling them who they need to buy a gift for.
